title: Philosophy for Life and Other Dangerous Situations by Jules Evan
description:
When philosophy rescued him from an emotional crisis, Jules Evans
became fascinated by how ideas invented over two thousand years ago
can help us today. He interviewed soldiers, psychologists, gangsters,
astronauts, and anarchists and discovered the ways that people are
using philosophy now to build better lives. Ancient philosophy has
